lines.text: Uh... maybe... maybe I was wrong. Maybe the <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole...</c> did, actually, kill him.
Huh? Didn't you say it don't damage what it's made in?
Well, maybe... but even if it doesn't damage the material, it could still let blood spill out.
Like, if you dispelled it, it'd close up the blood vessels and stuff, but...
Y'know, there wouldn't be blood in them. Which you need. To survive.
Wait- what keeps the hole open, then?
You make the hole, but... somethin's gotta stop the stuff from movin' back into place.
If it keeps out the solids, why wouldn't it keep out the liquids?
We'll make an arcane scholar of you yet!
Anyway, yeah, I guess I'm gonna stick with the nonlethal hole theory, then.
